<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [char](./extension-mention.suggestionmatcher.char.md) | <code>string</code> | The character to match against |
|  [name](./extension-mention.suggestionmatcher.name.md) | <code>string</code> | Name of matching character - This will be appended to the classnames |
